text: «+ Appropriate patient selection and evaluation, with emphasis on a focused airway examination. «+ Only ASA1and Il patients qualify for sedation outside the operating theatre. « Knowledge of the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of drugs. «+ Administration of the minimal dose of drug necessary to make the patient safe and comfortable. This dose must have taken full effect before any additional dose is administered. The use of fixed doses or boluses is not recommended. « Trained sedation practitioner, support staff, and facilities meeting the requirements for safe practice. - Sedation practitioners must be able to manage, rescue and recover a patient who enters a deeper than intended level of sedation.
